article_title: COMMENTARY: The Catholic case for contraception coverage
article_text:
Active RNS subscribers and members can view this content by logging-in here.

WASHINGTON (RNS) Institutions -- both secular and “religious institutions,” as well as “religious organizations” -- do not have the right to claim “consciences” in order to trample on the conscience rights that properly belong to their employees.

article_metadata.news_keywords: Beliefs, Ethics, Institutions, Opinion, Politics, Affordable Care Act, Catholic, Catholics for Choice, Christian, contraception mandate
